channel.title: Zomby on mattischrome

item.title: Album Digest, July 2011
item.description:
Quite a mixed bag this month.

  1. SBTRKT SBTRKT
  2. Zomby Dedication
  3. Brian Eno Drums Between The Bells
  4. Bon Iver Bon Iver
  5. Washed Out Within and Without

This monthâ€™s collection of albums is a rather mellow bunch. The SBTRKT album (self-titled) is probably the most frenetic of the five though even that does not exactly pound four to the floor. Most of it is pretty calm, though the occasional burst of pop to spice things up: sometimes it is as downtempo as the rest (Right Thing To Do and Trials Of The Past) but at other times things spark into life, as on Pharaohs.
